Subject: The NEON System?

Hi, Does anyone know anything about this:

"Stepwise Transition from Direct Encoding to Artificial Ontogeny in
Neuroevolution"
http://www.springerlink.com/content/52272p730177r470/

------------------
Benjamin Inden
(1)  	Max Planck Institute for Mathematics in the Sciences,

Abstract
There is a gap between neuroevolution systems employing artificial
ontogeny and those being able to solve difficult control tasks. The
NEON system builds on ideas of the well known NEAT neuroevolution
system to make possible a stepwise transition from a direct encoding
to complex genetic architectures using developmental processes.
------------------


Colin.
